IBM and Business Intelligence Solutions are sponsoring a fun and entertaining event at the IBM Innovation Center in Waltham on May 16.

 

Please register at http://operationalrisk.eventbrite.com

The role Governance, Risk and Compliance plays in solving complex security and risk challenges in Healthcare and Life Sciences

 

IBM and Business Intelligence Solutions are co-sponsoring our meetup at the IBM Innovation Center in Waltham on May 16.

DATA:  Thursday, May 16 

Where:  IBM Innovation Center 404 Wyman Street 4th Floor Waltham, Massachusetts 02454 (781) 895-1234

Time:  5:00 pm to 8 pm 

The next disruption to your enterprise isn’t a matter of “if” but “when.” In 2012, it was estimated that $140 billion in economic losses were caused by natural catastrophes and man-made disasters.

Today's healthcare and life science market applies different pressures to both payers and providers.  Payers face intense competition that is driven by consumers who are demanding more flexible products, increased transparency and better service.

The answer to managing and mitigating such risk is to bring governance, risk management and compliance together in an integrated program where policies, data and controls are strategically managed and visible throughout the healthcare enterprise.

An enterprise governance, risk and compliance (eGRC) strategy, supported by a common technology platform creates consistency and transparency, enables collaboration, fosters operation efficiencies and ensures stability, continuity and the success of your healthcare organization.

Food and refreshments will be served with ample time given to networking opportunities - bring plenty of business cards.
